DOC.brief_summary: This open label , Phase 1 study investigate relative bioavailability ABT-333 deliver within different site gastrointestinal tract 12 healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability ABT-333 Within Gastrointestinal Tract Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Body mass index 18.0 35.0 kg/m2 , outside range , consider clinically significant investigator 2 . Subjects must demonstrate ability swallow empty size 000 capsule 3 . Must willing able communicate participate whole study 4 . Must provide write informed consent 5 . Must agree use adequate method contraception 1 . Participation clinical research study within previous 3 month 2 . History drug alcohol abuse past 2 year current smoker smoke within last 12 month . A breath carbon monoxide read great 10 ppm screen 3 . Females childbearing potential pregnant lactating ( female subject must negative urine pregnancy test screen admission ) 4 . Radiation exposure , include present study , exclude background radiation include diagnostic xrays medical exposure , exceed 5 ( micro sievert ) mSv last 12 month 10 mSv last 5 year . No occupationally expose worker , define Ionising Radiation Regulations 1999 , shall participate study 5 . Positive hepatitis A virus immunoglobulin M ( HAVIgM ) , hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , hepatitis C virus antibody ( HCV Ab ) human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) result 6 . Donation loss great 400 mL blood within previous 3 month 7 . Subjects take , take , prescribed overthecounter drug ( 4 g per day paracetamol , hormone replacement therapy ( HRT ) hormonal contraception ) herbal remedy 14 day Investigational Medical Product ( IMP ) administration . Exceptions may apply case case basis consider interfere objective study Principal Investigator ( delegate ) sponsor 's medical monitor 8 . Acute diarrhoea constipation 7 day predict first study day . If screening occurs > 7 day first study day , criterion determine first study day . Diarrhoea define passage liquid faeces and/or stool frequency great 3 time per day . Constipation define failure open bowel frequently every day 9 . Presence nonremovable metal object metal plate , screw , etc , abdominal region body ( exception sterilisation clip )
